summary: Allows the player to use items that are in the game but were previously either unobtainable or non-playable.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3]This mod allows the player to use some of the armor and weapon sets in the game that they were unable to use before.[/size]


[size=4][b]WEAPONS ADDED

[/b][/size]-Giant's Club

-Kataliah's Bow (The one she uses, not the one she gives you. Has a faster draw speed)

-Falmer Supple Bow

-Briarheart Geis

-Ghorbash's Ancestral Axe

-Herebane's Courage

-Tsun's Battle Axe

-Sild's Staff

-Nord Hero Arrow

[b][size=4]
ARMOR ADDED[/size][/b]

-Ancient Falmer Set

-Head Bandages

-Arm Bandages

-Prisoner's Cuffs

-Executioner's Robes (Works only with male characters)

-Execution Hood (Black and White variants)

-Family Shield

-Focusing Gloves

-Greybeard's Set

-Herebane's Fortress

-Karliah's Set

-Summerset Shadow set

-Nocturnal's set

-Psijic Set

-Sheogorath's set

-Tsun's set

[/center]
author: Asura1997
